form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Begich (for himself and Ms. Murkowski) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To exempt National Forest System land in the State of Alaska from the Roadless Area Conservation Rule.

section.text: The Roadless Area Conservation Rule established under part 294 of title 36, Code of Federal Regulations (and successor regulations), does not apply with respect to any National Forest System land in the State of Alaska.
